title: The First Act
description: Janice has been dating the perfect guy, at least that's what everyone has been telling her. He's handsome, attentive, and is at the beginning of a great career, even her parents would approve. However there's something missing in their relationship that Jan can't quite put her finger on until a brief encounter with a sexy stranger fills the emptiness she's been feeling. This is a short (5,000 words) erotic romance story. It is the first book in The Private Play Series
author: Bedelia de Winter
